full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @029A *, ,(CES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA MO NAS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POS BSKUL MA BYUNG ZHING, NYE CHAR 'JAM MGON BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA CAN LHA LCAM RIN CHEN SKYID 'DZOM GYIS LAM GYI RIM PA'I KHRID MDOR BSDUS SNYING POR DRIL BA RGYUN DU BSKYANG CHOG PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I RGYAN DU 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, YUL SKYID GRONG GI NAGS KHROD BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS KUN TU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,RJE BTZUN BLA MA'I RNAM PAR THAR PA LA, ,SKAD CIG TZAM YANG LOG LTA MI SKYE ZHING, ,CI MDZAD YON TAN MTHONG BA'I MOS GUS KYIS, ,BLA MA'I BYIN RLABS SEMS LA 'JUG PAR SHOG ,'DI YANG BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG THOR RGOD WANG RNAM RGYAL TSE BRTAN SHOG GI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE, CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU DPAR DU SGRUBS PA'I 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GYUR CIG , ,,)
